question: How many canteens are opened in Haryana under Antyodaya Aahaar Yojana?
explanation: Haryana State Government launched four canteens which will serve subsidised and healthy food to the poor. Haryana Chief Minister Manohar Lal Khattar launched these canteens at Faridabad, Gurugram, Hisar, and Yamunanagar. These canteens have been set up under the 'Antyodaya Aahaar Yojana' aimed at providing healthy, nutritious and hygienic food to poor and needy people of the state. All poor and needy people in the state can buy a food packet from these canteens at just Rs. 10/-. The food packet weighs 730 gm and offers 1150 calories.
